import time,sys,ctypes Python_to_C_Call = PLCBinary.Python_to_C_Call Python_to_C_Call.restype = ctypes.c_int Python_to_C_Call.argtypes = [ctypes.c_int, ctypes.POINTER(ctypes.c_int)]
def MyPythonFunc(arg): i = ctypes.c_int() if(Python_to_C_Call(arg, i)): res = i.value print "toC:", arg, "from C:", res, "FBID:", FBID else: print "Failed Python_to_C_Call failed" res = None sys.stdout.flush() return res
